column5: For those who use it, the old jug (green in colour) was 4 litres and is on sale for $22.99 at Canadian Tire. There is now a new jug (white) that has a graticule on the side for measuring (old one did not have it) and it is a 5 litre jug. It is also on sale this week for the same price as the old 4 litre jug. Not bad getting an extra litre for free!!
Thanx that's all I use SBK
